title: Welcome to StarryMatch
user_determine:
Before Start 
 can you give us your preferred real identity
username_too_short: Username must be at least 5 characters long
username_rules:
Your username must:
- Be at least 5 characters long
- Not contain spaces
- Be unique (if applicable)
test_selections: Select your story that you wanted to create first
mbti_desc:
This story will give you one of 16 personalities 
that suits you best!
enne_desc:
This story will give you one of 9 types of personalities 
that is suitable for you.
start_chat_not_allowed: You need to complete the {0} test before accessing this feature.
criteria_description: To make every journey the best, these selections will help you a lot!
userlist_description:
Here is your new friend who made your conversation memorable.
Want to continue relationships or Endorse them?
not_enough_coins: Not enough coins to make this purchase
hat_description: Choose your favorite hat to complete your avatar.
clothes_description: Choose your favorite clothes to complete your avatar.
skins_description: Choose your favorite skin to complete your avatar.
email_verification_message: Please verify your email. A verification email has been sent again.
account_created_message: Your account has been created. Please check your email to verify your account.
invalid_password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
user_not_found: No user found for that email.
email_already_in_use: The email address is already in use by another account.
weak_password: The password provided is too weak.
invalid_email: The email address is badly formatted.
confirm_purchase_message: Are you sure you want to add {0} Starry Coins to your account?
purchase_error: Error adding coins. Please try again.
confirm_plasma_purchase_message: Are you sure you want to purchase {0} Starry Plasma for {1} Starry Coins?
plasma_description: Starry Plasma allows you to endorse other users and show appreciation for meaningful conversations.
valuable_user_message: This user is valuable, feel free to talk with them!
already_friends: You are already friends with this user
friend_request_exists: You have already sent a friend request
reverse_friend_request_exists: This user has already sent you a friend request. Please check your notifications.
user_id_subtitle: This is your unique identifier in the app
user_id_rules:
Your User ID must:
- Be at least 5 characters
- Not contain any spaces
- Be unique to you
user_left_chat: The other user has left the chat.
leave_room_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave this chat room?
please_answer_all: Please answer all questions before finishing!
answers_too_balanced: Your answers are too balanced. Please create a new story!
message_notification_message: You have received a new message
reset_password_message: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
reset_password_success: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox.
reset_password_error: Error sending reset email. Please try again.
